languages.text:
Персонаж потерял сознание — его {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} опустилось до 0!
Он больше не может участвовать в бою, и его нельзя привести в чувства. После боя персонаж придет в себя и получит {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}травму{/g}, которую можно исцелить, отдохнув на корабле, или в других специальных местах.

Your character has lost consciousness — their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} have been reduced to 0!
The character can no longer participate in combat nor can they be resuscitated by any means. They will regain consciousness after the battle and receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, which can be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.
languages.original_text:
Персонаж потерял сознание — его {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} опустилось до 0!
Он больше не может участвовать в бою, и его нельзя привести в чувства. После боя персонаж придет в себя и получит {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}травму{/g}, которую можно исцелить, отдохнув на корабле, или в других специальных местах.

traits.locale_text:
Your character has lost consciousness — their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} have been reduced to 0!
The character can no longer participate in combat nor can they be resuscitated by any means. They will regain consciousness after the battle and receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}trauma{/g}, which can be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

Your character has lost consciousness — their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} have been reduced to 0!
The character can no longer participate in combat nor can they be resuscitated by any means. They will regain consciousness after the battle and receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, which can be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

languages.text:
Tu personaje ha quedado inconsciente: ¡sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} han bajado a 0!
El personaje no puede participar en combate ni se le puede reanimar de ninguna manera. Recuperará el conocimiento tras la batalla y sufrirá una {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g}, que podrás curar descansando en la nave u otros lugares adecuados para descansar.
languages.original_text:
Your character has lost consciousness — their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} have been reduced to 0!
The character can no longer participate in combat nor can they be resuscitated by any means. They will regain consciousness after the battle and receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, which can be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

traits.locale_text:
Tu personaje ha quedado inconsciente: ¡sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} han bajado a 0!
El personaje no puede participar en combate ni se le puede reanimar de ninguna manera. Recuperará el conocimiento tras la batalla y sufrirá una {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g}, que podrás curar descansando en la nave u otros lugares adecuados para descansar.

languages.text:
キャラクターが意識を失い、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}がゼロになった！
その場合、そのキャラクターは戦闘に参加できず、どんな手段を使っても蘇生できない。戦闘後、意識を取り戻し{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}を受けるが、船上など休息に適した場所で休めば回復する。
languages.original_text:
Your character has lost consciousness — their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} have been reduced to 0!
The character can no longer participate in combat nor can they be resuscitated by any means. They will regain consciousness after the battle and receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, which can be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

traits.locale_text:
あなたのキャラクターは意識を失い、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}がゼロになった！
そのキャラクターは戦闘に参加できず、どんな手段を使っても蘇生できない。戦闘後、意識を取り戻し{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}を受けるが、船上など休息に適した場所で休めば回復する。

languages.text:
您的角色已经失去知觉，该角色的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}已降低为0！
该角色无法再参与战斗，也无法通过任何方式重新加入战斗。他们会在战斗结束后恢复意识，并获得{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}效果。若想治愈创伤，需要在舰船或其他适合休息的地方进行休息。
languages.original_text:
Your character has lost consciousness — their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} have been reduced to 0!
The character can no longer participate in combat nor can they be resuscitated by any means. They will regain consciousness after the battle and receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, which can be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

traits.locale_text:
您的角色已经失去知觉，该角色的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}已降低为0！
该角色无法再参与战斗，也无法通过任何方式重新加入战斗。他们会在战斗结束后恢复意识，并获得{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}效果。若想治愈创伤，需要在舰船或其他适合休息的地方进行休息。

languages.text:
Dein Charakter hat das Bewusstsein verloren. Seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wurden auf 0 reduziert!
Der Charakter kann nicht mehr am Kampf teilnehmen und nicht wiederbelebt werden. Er erlangt nach dem Kampf das Bewusstsein zurück und erleidet ein {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g}, das durch Ausruhen auf dem Schiff oder an anderen geeigneten Orten geheilt werden kann.
languages.original_text:
Your character has lost consciousness — their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} have been reduced to 0!
The character can no longer participate in combat nor can they be resuscitated by any means. They will regain consciousness after the battle and receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, which can be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

traits.locale_text:
Dein Charakter hat das Bewusstsein verloren – seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} sind auf 0 reduziert worden!
Der Charakter kann nicht mehr am Kampf teilnehmen und kann auch nicht wiederbelebt werden. Er wird nach dem Kampf das Bewusstsein wiedererlangen und ein {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g} erleiden, das durch Ausruhen im Schiff oder an bestimmten anderen zum Ausruhen geeigneten Orten geheilt werden kann.

languages.text:
Votre personnage a perdu connaissance. Ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}lésions{/g} ont été réduites à 0 !
Le personnage ne peut plus participer au combat ni être réanimé par quelque moyen que ce soit. Il reprendra conscience après le combat et subira un {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g} dont il pourra se remettre en se reposant à bord du vaisseau ou dans d'autres endroits propices au repos.
languages.original_text:
Your character has lost consciousness — their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} have been reduced to 0!
The character can no longer participate in combat nor can they be resuscitated by any means. They will regain consciousness after the battle and receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, which can be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

traits.locale_text:
Votre personnage a perdu connaissance. Ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}lésions{/g} ont été réduites à 0 !
Le personnage ne peut plus participer au combat ni être réanimé par quelque moyen que ce soit. Il reprendra conscience après le combat et subira un {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g} dont il pourra se remettre en se reposant sur le vaisseau ou dans certains autres endroits propices au repos.

languages.text:
Karakterin bayıldı ve {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} değeri sıfıra indi!
Bayılan bir karakter artık çatışmaya katılamaz ve hiçbir şekilde ayıltılamaz. Çatışmadan sonra bilinci yerine gelir ancak yaşadığı bu baygınlık onda {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travma{/g} yaratır. Bu travmalar, gemin başta olmak üzere uygun yerlerde dinlenerek iyileştirilebilir.
languages.original_text:
Your character has lost consciousness — their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} have been reduced to 0!
The character can no longer participate in combat nor can they be resuscitated by any means. They will regain consciousness after the battle and receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, which can be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.
